thread.section_title: Hudson Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A hipster's paradise
thread.title_full: A hipster's paradise - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Þröstur S
title: A hipster's paradise
text:
The coolest hotel I've ever seen, the lobby with it's chandelier is breathtaking and the breakfast hall is like something straight out of NY movie, a real NY hipster loft with chesterfields and a fireplace. The lounge bar with the pool table and second floor library is breathtaking.
Room Tip: Opt for a room high up, the parties at the bar can get a bit loud ;) See more room tips
